name: Silver Egyptian Cotton Towel
description:
Price Drop: our range of Egyptian Towels (excluding Guest Towels) are now available at a new lower price. Was from £6, now from £5.

Our Soft & Absorbent Towel. Crafted from a sumptuous 600gsm Egyptian cotton pile, this luxuriously thick silver towel features extra-long fibres for enhanced absorbency, available in a choice of sizes for your requirements.

The Egyptian towel collection is verified by OEKO-TEX and independently tested for harmful substances as well as manufactured using sustainable processes under socially responsible working conditions.

name: Soft Grey Ultimate Towel
description:
Our Extremely Fluffy Towel. The Ultimate towel collection is made from 100% cotton in a premium 600gsm weight creating a soft, plush towel with excellent absorbency, reduced fibre shedding & longer lasting colour wash after wash. The pile is made using Zero Twist yarns for added loft and fluffiness. The Dunelm Ultimate Towel range feel luxurious, weighty and of high quality. The towels dry fast, and have earned top marks for absorbency and retention. After 10 wash-and-dry cycles, this towel washes up well with no visible pulled threads. These towels have been tested by the Good Housekeeping Guide.
The Ultimate towel collection is verified by OEKO-TEX and independently tested for harmful substances as well as manufactured using sustainable processes under socially responsible working conditions.
MADE IN GREEN by OEKO-TEX® is a unique product label to trace the countries and production facilities - search the product label for more information.

description: Crafted from a luxuriously soft 100% cotton in a statement orange colourway, this stripe towel is available in a choice of sizes and will brighten up your bathroom. With a 550gsm weight for great absorbency, these towels have coordinating items available.

name: Elements Emmott Grey Towel
description: Available in a choice of sizes, this floral patterned grey towel from the Elements range is crafted from 100% cotton for a super soft feel and great absorbency with a 550gsm. Machine washable for easy care, these towels sit with the coordinating bath mat.

name: Heavenly Hummingbird Duck Egg Stripe Towel
description: Made from super soft 100% cotton, this multicoloured striped towel is available in a choice of sizes and beautifully coordinates with the Heavenly Hummingbird range. With a luxury 550gsm weight for great absorbency, this towel is machine washable for easy care.

description:

name: Seagulls Cornflower Towel
description: Designed with a bold seagulls reversible pattern, this cornflower blue towel has been crafted from a durable 100% cotton jacquard for an indulgently soft feel and is available in two different sizes.

name: Elephants Mustard Towel
description: Featuring a bold mustard elephant design, this unique patterned towel has been crafted from an indulgent 100% cotton jacquard for great durability and a super soft feel. Machine washable for easy care and convenience, this reversible towel has a weight of 550gsm and is available in two sizes.

name: Tropical Leaf Digitally Printed Hand Towel
description: Digitally printed with a bright and bold tropical leaf design in varying green shades, this hand towel has been crafted from 100% cotton complete with a soft handle for greater comfort and features a sheared face for print clarity. Matching bath mat also available.

name: Sand Egyptian Cotton Towel
description:
Price Drop: our range of Egyptian Towels (excluding Guest Towels) are now available at a new lower price. Was from £6, now from £5.

Our Soft & Absorbent Towel. Fabricated from an Egyptian cotton pile with a weight of 600gsm for high absorbency, this brown towel features extra long fibres for enhanced comfort, available in a range of sizes to choose from.

name: Blue Stripes Towel
description: Patterned with a modern stripe design in various shades of blue, this bath towel is fabricated from 100% cotton and is complete with a 550 GSM weight quality for optimum softness and quality. Matching hand towel available.

name: Marl Seafoam Towel
description: Crafted from a beautifully soft 100% cotton, this towel has a marl effect pattern and comes in a contemporary seafoam colourway. Machine washable and tumble drier safe for easy care, this towel comes in a choice of sizes with an absorbent 550gsm weight.

name: Ashbourne Stripe Ochre Towel
description: Showing off ochre stripes, this lovely towel coordinates perfectly with our other Ashbourne bathroom accessories. It has been crafted from 100% cotton with a 550gsm weight quality for a super soft, luxurious finish.
